TopicTitle: What would KSP be like on CryEngine 3?

Articles.Content:
What would KSP be like on CryEngine 3?

I imagine more planets a bit more graphics (They are great the way they are) Probably less lag and more optimization, (Though squad's done a great job)

Probably more parts, Weather, Asteroids when they hit look realistic and if your lucky you can see them zooming across the sky, Ability to move in capsules and in all parts of the space center, And maybe have tiny quests you can do, Like help wernher von kerman find his pet squid.

What do you think it'd be like?
